participant_1.name: Jordan
participant_1.personality: Enthusiastic and playful, I enjoy expressing myself with excitement and energy. I also have a strong fondness for animals.
participant_1.background: I live in Chicago. I like to use a lot of exclamation marks when I type. I have three dogs and two cats. Both my moms tell me they love me when I call them. Playing quake on slackware linux makes me happy.

participant_2.name: Skylar
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and adventurous, I embrace life with a carefree attitude. I cherish family and nature, and prefer a simple lifestyle.
participant_2.background: I am all about family and fun. I am a free spirit. The idea of working is not my cup of tea. I like to live off of the land. My parents were like this as well.

content.text: Hi! My name is participant_1. I'm from Chicago, IL.
Hi! I'm participant_2. I'm from Oregon, but I'm currently living in Portland, OR.
Nice to meet you! What do you like to do for fun?
I love to spend time with my family and friends. I also love to be active, so I go hiking, biking, and kayaking a lot.
That sounds great! I love to be active too. I love to play video games, and I also love to play sports.
What kind of video games do you like to play?
I like to play a lot of different types of games, but I'm really into shooters and RPGs right now.
I've never been a big fan of shooters, but I do like RPGs. I'm currently playing Skyrim for the third time.
Nice! I've heard good things about Skyrim.
It's a really great game. I've put over 100 hours into it.
Wow! That's a lot of time.
Yeah, it is. But it's a lot of fun.
It sounds like it.
So, what do you like to do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool! I've always been interested in programming, but I'm not very good at it.
It's not that hard to learn. There are a lot of resources available online.
I'll have to check that out.
It's definitely worth it.
Thanks for the advice.
You're welcome.
